chunk:
Whind Marrakech Light

Brand: Whind

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Hydrogenated ethylhexyl olivate, Hydrogenated olive oil unsaponifiables, Limnanthes alba (Meadowfoam) seed oil, Argania spinosa kernel oil, Prunus armeniaca (Apricot) kernel oil, Balanites roxburghii seed oil, Prunus amygdalus dulcis (Sweet almond) oil, Crambe abyssinica seed oil, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) seed oil, Opuntia

oil, Prunus armeniaca (Apricot) kernel oil, Balanites roxburghii seed oil, Prunus amygdalus dulcis (Sweet almond) oil, Crambe abyssinica seed oil, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) seed oil, Opuntia ficus-indica seed oil, Parfum [Fragrance], Tocopherol, Benzyl benzoate, Benzyl cinnamate, Coumarin
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
